General.Name: Veranda Resort Public Company Limited
General.Description: Veranda Resort Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the operation of hotels and resorts under Veranda and SO brands in Thailand. The company is also involved in the development of properties; rental of commercial buildings; and operation of restaurants. Veranda Resort Public Company Limited was founded in 1991 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.
